item.title: Dual AC Router Setup for $120
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs)
item.description: I will be using two Custom firmware routers to get full house coverage on a very old house with thick lead filled walls. The entire project took 6 hours due to some unexpected issues we faced. You can flash any device below as well to Merlin custom firmware but its entirely optional. This will work with the stock firmware.
